Title: Pantham
Writer: Bobby Kolli (screenplay), K. Chakravarthy Reddy (story), Ramesh Reddy (dialogue)
Actors: Tottempudi Gopichand, Mehreen Pirzada, Ajay, Harshavardhan
Plot: Vikranth (Gopichand) is a vigilante who has targeted 'Nayak Bhai' (Sampath Raj) and his money. Who is Vikranth and what is his beef with Nayak forms the crux of the story.
